enchantment.scriptor.charged.desc: Strengthens your next attack. Reduces by 1 after each hit.
subject.scriptor.self: 这个法术似乎以施法者为目标。
subject.scriptor.touch: 这个法术似乎以任何施法者接触到的物体为目标。
subject.scriptor.storm: 这个法术似乎以施法者为中心在周围施展了无数次。
subject.scriptor.projectile: 这个法术会发射一个弹射物，击中即施法。
subject.scriptor.rune: 这个法术会放置一个符文，被接触即施法。
subject.scriptor.enchant: 这个法术似乎以物品栏中的其它物品为目标。
subject.scriptor.hitscan: This spell targets whatever is in front of the caster.
descriptor.scriptor.long: 这个法术中的某些东西使效果持续时间更长。
descriptor.scriptor.longer: This spell lasts somewhat longer than usual.
descriptor.scriptor.very_long: This spell lasts a very long time.
descriptor.scriptor.stacking_long: This spell's effects last slightly longer.
descriptor.scriptor.strong: 这个法术似乎以某种方式得到了加强。
descriptor.scriptor.stacking_strong: This spell has been slightly strengthened.
descriptor.scriptor.powerful: This spell has been strengthened greatly.
descriptor.scriptor.fast: 这个法术似乎比一般法术快。
descriptor.scriptor.slow: 这个法术似乎比一般法术慢。
descriptor.scriptor.chain: This spell reaches out to nearby targets.
descriptor.scriptor.nether: The target is changed to a different plane.
descriptor.scriptor.blood_power:
你在这个法术中感觉到一种邪恶的力量。
使用时可能会受伤。
descriptor.scriptor.overwhelming: The strength of this spell overwhelms the caster.
descriptor.scriptor.solar_power: This spell is strengthened during the day.
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.ace: This bears the colors of the Asexual Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.agend: This bears the colors of the Agender Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.aro: This bears the colors of the Aromantic Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.bi: This bears the colors of the Bisexual Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.enby: This bears the colors of the Nonbinary Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.gende: This bears the colors of the Genderqueer Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.inter: This bears the colors of the Intersex Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.lesbi: This bears the colors of the Lesbian Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.pan: This bears the colors of the Pansexual Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.poly: This bears the colors of the Polyamorous Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.color.scriptor.trans: This bears the colors of the Trans Pride Flag
descriptor.scriptor.cheap: 出于某种原因，这个法术的成本比大多数法术要低。
descriptor.scriptor.blood_cost:
你在这个法术中感受到一种残暴的效率。
使用时可能会受伤。
descriptor.scriptor.healthy: This spell seems to demand perfect health.
descriptor.scriptor.poisoned: You must be poisoned to channel this spell.
descriptor.scriptor.critical: This spell pulls power from the caster's grave injuries.
descriptor.scriptor.night: This spell only works under cover of night.
descriptor.scriptor.rain: This spell is aided by the falling rain.
descriptor.scriptor.weakened: This spell draws from the user's weakness.
descriptor.scriptor.on_fire: This spell's user must be on fire.
descriptor.scriptor.clear_skies: This spell won't work in the rain.
descriptor.scriptor.white: 封面上的文字发出白色的光芒。
descriptor.scriptor.light_gray: 封面上有不引人注目的浅灰色文字。
descriptor.scriptor.dark_gray: 封面上的文字是一种灰暗的深灰色。
descriptor.scriptor.black: 封面上的文字是普通的黑色。
descriptor.scriptor.red: 封面上的文字拥有火红色的光泽。
descriptor.scriptor.orange: 封面上的文字闪耀着温暖的橙色。
descriptor.scriptor.yellow: 封面上的文字是闪闪发光的黄色。
descriptor.scriptor.lime_green: 封面上的字在黄绿色中显得非常突出。
descriptor.scriptor.green: 绿色的文字在封面上爬行。
descriptor.scriptor.light_blue: 浅蓝色的文字在封面上流动。
descriptor.scriptor.cyan: 封面上的文字是一种干净的青色。
descriptor.scriptor.blue: 深蓝色的字在封面上汇集起来。
descriptor.scriptor.purple: 一种皇室风格的紫色标题装饰着封面。
descriptor.scriptor.magenta: 封面由艳丽的品红色装饰。
descriptor.scriptor.pink: 封面上的文字被染成了花粉色。
descriptor.scriptor.brown: 一抹不起眼的棕色被泼洒在封面。
descriptor.scriptor.rainbow: The text shimmers like a prism.
descriptor.scriptor.inventory: This spell targets a target's inventory
descriptor.scriptor.first_empty: This spell targets the first empty slot in an inventory
descriptor.scriptor.first_filled: This spell targets the first filled slot in an inventory
descriptor.scriptor.first_matching: This spell targets the first valid slot in an inventory
descriptor.scriptor.caster_inventory: This spell focuses on the caster's inventory
descriptor.scriptor.caster_first_empty: This spell focuses on the first empty slot in the caster's inventory
descriptor.scriptor.caster_first_filled: This spell focuses on the first filled slot in the caster's inventory
descriptor.scriptor.caster_first_matchin: This spell focuses on the first valid slot in the caster's inventory
descriptor.scriptor.copy_left: This spell's targets are copied over one block to the left
descriptor.scriptor.copy_right: This spell's targets are copied over one block to the right
descriptor.scriptor.copy_forwards: This spell's targets are copied over one block forwards
descriptor.scriptor.copy_backwards: This spell's targets are copied over one block backwards
descriptor.scriptor.copy_up: This spell's targets are copied over one block up
descriptor.scriptor.copy_down: This spell's targets are copied over one block down
descriptor.scriptor.move_left: This spell's targets are moved one block to the left
descriptor.scriptor.move_right: This spell's targets are moved one block to the right
descriptor.scriptor.move_forwards: This spell's targets are moved one block forwards
descriptor.scriptor.move_backwards: This spell's targets are moved one block backwards
descriptor.scriptor.move_up: This spell's targets are moved one block up
descriptor.scriptor.move_down: This spell's targets are moved one block down
action.scriptor.inflame: 这个法术能加热或点燃目标。
action.scriptor.light: This spell places a light where it is cast.
action.scriptor.heal: 这个法术可以治疗或修复目标。
action.scriptor.smite: 这个法术使目标被电击。
action.scriptor.explosion: 这个法术会在目标位置产生爆炸
action.scriptor.goto: 这个法术能将施法者带到目标处。
action.scriptor.swap: 这个法术可以调换施法者和目标的位置。
action.scriptor.bring: 这个法术可以将目标带到施法者身边。
action.scriptor.break: 这个法术可以破坏物品和方块。
action.scriptor.color: This spell changes the target's color.
action.scriptor.time: This spell marches the clock forwards.
action.scriptor.clear_weather: The clouds part when this spell is cast.
action.scriptor.regeneration: This spell heals the target over time.
action.scriptor.wither: This spell withers the target away.
action.scriptor.saturation: This spell sates the target's hunger.
action.scriptor.speed: This spell speeds up the target.
action.scriptor.haste: This spell hastens the target's hands.
action.scriptor.strength: This spell empowers or grows the target.
action.scriptor.jump_boost: This spell bolsters the target's legs.
action.scriptor.resistance: This spell toughens up the target.
action.scriptor.fire_resistance: This spell makes the target immune to fire.
action.scriptor.water_breathing: This spell fills the target's lungs.
action.scriptor.night_vision: This spell lights the target's eyes.
action.scriptor.weakness: This spell weakens the target's arms.
action.scriptor.hero: This spell makes the target beloved.
action.scriptor.phasing: This spell makes the target ethereal.
action.scriptor.wild_phasing: This spell makes the target's form waver.
action.scriptor.bound_axe: This spell binds magic into an axe.
action.scriptor.bound_sword: This spell summons an ethereal sword.
action.scriptor.bound_pickaxe: This spell brings forth a magical pickaxe.
action.scriptor.bound_shovel: This spell coalesces energy into a shovel.
extra.scriptor.fizzle: 这本宝典在你手中开始变暖，然后消失了。
extra.scriptor.tome_use: 你拍落了古书上的灰尘……
extra.scriptor.scrap_use: You straighten out the old piece of paper...
extra.scriptor.scrap_description: Right click to uncover a spell component.
extra.scriptor.scrap_get: You were able to restore the page.
extra.scriptor.hoarse: 上次施法的残余物仍在你的喉咙里燃烧。在说出更多的咒语之前，你得先缓一缓。
extra.scriptor.mute: 魔力在你的胸中涌动，但你已经失语，无法念咒了……
extra.scriptor.enchant_wrong: 能量涌现却又立即消散。也许我应该在其他地方使用这个法术……
extra.scriptor.use_identify: 在魔法书上右击这个以获取更多信息。
extra.scriptor.tome_identified: §a已鉴定§7。按住潜行键获取更多信息。
extra.scriptor.condition_not_met: You try to cast this spell but stop short. It seems a condition has not been met...
extra.scriptor.chalk_unnamed_2: Name in an Anvil to use
lore.scriptor.player_crystal_1: Right click to attune this to yourself
lore.scriptor.coordinate_crystal_1: Right click to attune to a position
lore.scriptor.coordinate_crystal_2: Right click to add a position
lore.scriptor.not_community_1: This was not generated in Community Mode.
lore.scriptor.not_community_2: This was generated in Community Mode.
advancement.scriptor.community_desc: Play Scriptor Magicae with Community Mode enabled!
patchouli.scriptor.name: Simple Scriptomagy
command.scriptor.dump_noword: Please specify a word to dump.
command.scriptor.community_mode: Community mode is active; Debug commands are disabled.
command.scriptor.community_mode_give_tom: Community mode is active; Tomes cannot be given.
command.scriptor.community_mode_give_scr: Community mode is active; Scraps cannot be given.
command.scriptor.no_item_commands_creati: Due to limitations in the engine, custom spells cannot be cast on items while in creative mode.
tome.scriptor.heal_rune: A Quite Pleasant Trap to Trip
info.scriptor.spellbook_1: Spellbooks can be crafted or obtained from Tomes.
info.scriptor.spellbook_2: You can write one with a Spellbook and Quill or by converting a Written Book.
info.scriptor.spellbook_3: Spellbooks must be written with a valid spell to be used.
info.scriptor.book_of_books_1: A Book of Books can be used to store and directly cast numerous books.
info.scriptor.book_of_books_2: To insert a book into a Book of Books, hold it in your mouse cursor and right click on the Book of Books.
info.scriptor.book_of_books_3: To remove a book from a Book of Books, right click on the Book of Books with your mouse cursor.
info.scriptor.bound_tool_1: This tool can only be summoned using magic.
info.scriptor.bound_tool_2: After a brief period, it will unravel and vanish.
